text: @RepMarkTakano @SarahKSilverman But... but... but... OBAMA WASN'T THERE TO SAVE THEM!  He didn't leave them any COVID-19 tests... he... he... he let our military run out of ammunition! (that has to be the dumbest F'ing lie I've ever heard, BTW)
